description: Snapshot epoch index (aligned with saved hidden/output snapshots).
Frobenius norm of the recurrent matrix W_hh at this snapshot.
Frobenius norm of S = 0.5·(W + Wᵀ) at this snapshot.
Frobenius norm of A = 0.5·(W − Wᵀ) at this snapshot.
‖ W Wᵀ − Wᵀ W ‖_F, a measure of non-normality of W_hh at this snapshot.
Max |λ_i(W_hh)| computed from the saved snapshot matrix.
